title: Drawing, "International Casino: First Mezzanine, East Wall", June 15, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout; inscribed in graphite in architect's stamp: 546-71; 1/2' - 1'-0"; INT. CAS.; Olsson / 6/15/37; 6/15/37 1 BRECKER / " 2 WEISS / 6/16/37 5 BRECKER / 8/37 1 EMPIRE / 9/9/37 1 OFFICE; lower left: FIRST MEZZANINE - EAST WALL/COVER - BLUE MOHAIR - # 8926
description: Perspective and plan for eight-person upholstered sofa along east wall of the first mezzanine. Sofa covered in blue mohair. Up light fixture behind sofa against wall, mirror on wall bahind sofa. Four small tables placed in front of sofa. Sofa comes in two parts, and seats eight. Curved wall at right of sofa.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: First Mezzanine, East Wall", June 15, 1937.
June 15, 1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-221.
